languages.text: {n}Одна из конечностей Тервантьяса дергается и наносит удар вслепую — только рефлексы спасают Маражая от смертельной раны в шею. Впрочем, Гемункул более не пытается напасть — его, похоже, волнуют препараты и инструменты куда больше, чем нахальный кабалит.{/n}

{n}One of Tervantias's limbs twitches and strikes blindly. Only Marazhai's reflexes save him from a fatal neck wound, but the Haemonculus makes no further attempts to attack — he seems to care more about his substances and instruments than the insufferable Kabalite.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Одна из конечностей Тервантьяса дергается и наносит удар вслепую — только рефлексы спасают Маражая от смертельной раны в шею. Впрочем, Гемункул более не пытается напасть — его, похоже, волнуют препараты и инструменты куда больше, чем нахальный кабалит.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}One of Tervantias's limbs twitches and strikes blindly. Only Marazhai's reflexes save him from a fatal neck wound, but the haemonculus makes no further attempts to attack, he seems to care more about drugs and instruments than the insufferable Kabalite.{/n}

{n}One of Tervantias's limbs twitches and strikes blindly. Only Marazhai's reflexes save him from a fatal neck wound, but the haemonculus makes no further attempts to attack, he seems to care more about drugs and instruments than the insufferable Kabalite.{/n}

{n}One of Tervantias's limbs twitches and strikes blindly. Only Marazhai's reflexes save him from a fatal neck wound but the Haemonculus makes no further attempts to attack, he seems to care more about drugs and instruments than the insufferable Kabalite.{/n}

{n}One of Tervantias's limbs twitches and strikes blindly. Only Marazhai's reflexes save him from a fatal neck wound but the Haemonculus makes no further attempts to attack, he seems to care more about drugs and instruments than the insufferable Kabalite.{/n}

{n}One of Tervantias's limbs twitches and strikes blindly. Only Marazhai's reflexes save him from a fatal neck wound, but the Haemonculus makes no further attempts to attack — he seems to care more about his substances and instruments than the insufferable Kabalite.{/n}

{n}One of Tervantias's limbs twitches and strikes blindly. Only Marazhai's reflexes save him from a fatal neck wound, but the Haemonculus makes no further attempts to attack — he seems to care more about his substances and instruments than the insufferable Kabalite.{/n}

languages.text: {n}テルヴァンティアスの片方の手足が痙攣し、やみくもに殴りかかる。マラズハイはその反射神経のおかげで、首の致命傷は避けられたが、ハモンキュラスはそれ以上攻撃しようとしなかった。傲慢なカバライトよりもブツや器具の方が気になったようだ。.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}One of Tervantias's limbs twitches and strikes blindly. Only Marazhai's reflexes save him from a fatal neck wound, but the Haemonculus makes no further attempts to attack — he seems to care more about his substances and instruments than the insufferable Kabalite.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}テルヴァンティアスの片方の手足が痙攣し、やみくもに殴りかかる。マラズハイはその反射神経のおかげで、首の致命傷は避けられたが、ハモンキュラスはそれ以上攻撃しようとしなかった。傲慢なカバライトよりも薬物や器具の方が気になったようだ。.{/n}

languages.text: {n}特万提亚斯其中一条附肢抽搐起来，盲目地胡乱挥舞，想要在玛拉斋的脖子上划出一道致命的伤口，但玛拉斋却轻而易举地躲开了。不过，血伶人并没有进一步攻击的意图。比起眼前这个令人厌恶的阴谋团成员，他似乎更关心他的药剂与器械。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}One of Tervantias's limbs twitches and strikes blindly. Only Marazhai's reflexes save him from a fatal neck wound, but the Haemonculus makes no further attempts to attack — he seems to care more about his substances and instruments than the insufferable Kabalite.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}特万提亚斯其中一条附肢抽搐起来，盲目地胡乱挥舞，想要在玛拉斋的脖子上划出一道致命的伤口，但玛拉斋却轻而易举地躲开了。不过，血伶人并没有进一步攻击的意图。比起眼前这个令人厌恶的阴谋团成员，他似乎更关心他的药剂与器械。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Uno de los miembros de Tervantias se retuerce y golpea a ciegas. Los reflejos de Marazhai son lo único que le salva de una herida mortal en el cuello, pero el Hemónculo no hace más intentos de atacar, parece que le importan más sus sustancias y los instrumentos que el insufrible Kabalista.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}One of Tervantias's limbs twitches and strikes blindly. Only Marazhai's reflexes save him from a fatal neck wound, but the Haemonculus makes no further attempts to attack — he seems to care more about his substances and instruments than the insufferable Kabalite.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Uno de los miembros de Tervantias se retuerce y golpea a ciegas. Los reflejos de Marazhai son lo único que le salva de una herida mortal en el cuello, pero el Hemónculo no hace más intentos de atacar, parece que le importan más las drogas y los instrumentos que el insufrible Kabalista.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Eine von Tervantias' Gliedmaßen zuckt und schlägt blind um sich. Nur Marazhais Reflexe retten ihn vor einer tödlichen Halswunde, doch der Haemonculus unternimmt keine weiteren Angriffsversuche. Ihm scheinen die Substanzen und Instrumente wichtiger zu sein als der unerträgliche Kabalist.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}One of Tervantias's limbs twitches and strikes blindly. Only Marazhai's reflexes save him from a fatal neck wound, but the Haemonculus makes no further attempts to attack — he seems to care more about his substances and instruments than the insufferable Kabalite.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Eine von Tervantias' Gliedmaßen zuckt und schlägt blindlings um sich. Nur Marazhais Reflexe retten ihn vor einer tödlichen Halswunde, doch der Haemonculus unternimmt keine weiteren Angriffsversuche. Ihm scheinen die Rauschmittel und Instrumente wichtiger zu sein als der unerträgliche Kabalist.{/n}

languages.text: {n}L'un des appendices de Tervantias tressaille avant de fuser à toute vitesse. Si Marazhai parvient à esquiver une blessure fatale en protégeant son cou, c'est uniquement grâce à ses réflexes surdéveloppés. L'hémoncule ne retente pas d'autre attaque et fait mine de s'intéresser à ses substances et à ses instruments plutôt qu'à l'insupportable Kabalite.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}One of Tervantias's limbs twitches and strikes blindly. Only Marazhai's reflexes save him from a fatal neck wound, but the Haemonculus makes no further attempts to attack — he seems to care more about his substances and instruments than the insufferable Kabalite.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}L'un des appendices de Tervantias tressaille avant de fuser à toute vitesse. Si Marazhai parvient à esquiver une blessure fatale en protégeant son cou, c'est uniquement grâce à ses réflexes surdéveloppés. L'hémoncule ne retente pas d'autre attaque et fait mine de s'intéresser à ses remèdes et à ses instruments plutôt qu'à l'insupportable Kabalite.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Tervantias'ın uzuvlarından biri seğiriyor ve körlemesine saldırıyor. Marazhai, boynundan ölümcül bir yara almaktan muazzam refleksleri sayesinde kurtuluyor ve Haimonkulus başka saldırı teşebbüsünde bulunmuyor. Belli ki malzemelerini ve gereçlerini, sinir bozucu Kabalist'ten daha çok önemsiyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}One of Tervantias's limbs twitches and strikes blindly. Only Marazhai's reflexes save him from a fatal neck wound, but the Haemonculus makes no further attempts to attack — he seems to care more about his substances and instruments than the insufferable Kabalite.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Tervantias'ın uzuvlarından biri seğiriyor ve körlemesine saldırıyor. Marazhai, boynundan ölümcül bir yara almaktan muazzam refleksleri sayesinde kurtuluyor ve Haimonkulus başka saldırı teşebbüsünde bulunmuyor. Belli ki malzemelerini ve gereçlerini, sinir bozucu Kabalist'ten daha çok önemsiyor.{/n}
